/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with tall buildings, their gray and white facades reflecting the urban architecture of the city. The buildings are nestled amidst lush greenery, with trees and shrubs adding a touch of nature to the concrete jungle. Street lamps and traffic signs punctuate the scene, reminding us of the city's infrastructure. The sky above is a hazy blue, casting a serene backdrop to the bustling cityscape below.
